subject: Dear  Sir,
body:
Dear  Sir,
Thank  you for the  email. We  have  Gold  bars  for  sale   in Zambia  , the purity  of the gold  99.96  and  the  price  per  kilo gram is $48,000.
We  can  meet face  to  face  to finalize  the  transaction.Looking  further  to  receiving  your response.
We   look  forward  to   receiving  your immediate response to enable us to proceed  further  on the  details  of the transaction.
 
Note  We will ensure  that we secure  your commission as  our agent, if  you find  buyers for the  above  products.
You  can reach  me  on the  attached  whatsapp number  for further  communication
Regards
Tele:+27845030217

subject: Re:    Dear  Sir,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this exciting opportunity. I'm quite intrigued by the prospect of gold bars for sale in Zambia. Could you please provide more details about the purity of the gold and the price per kilogram? 

I appreciate your offer to meet face-to-face, but due to current circumstances, I would prefer to continue our discussions online if that's okay with you.

Also, could you elaborate on how the commission structure works if I were able to find buyers for these products? It sounds like an interesting proposition.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ruth
